metadata.name: Blockchain Bharat : Crypto
metadata.description:
Started as a need for a form of payment that wasn’t under the control of any one entity, but decentralized, Cryptocurrency has come a long way since 2009. It has led to a burgeoning new evolution of the financial world, as it adapts with technology that challenges its entire core operational methodology, relatively unchanged from the day the first bank opened. 

While the true scope of Cryptocurrency is still being explored… India, a country full of extremely intelligent, capable, and multi-talented citizens, is primed to be a front runner in this new frontier, but proper funding and educated policy making is vital to ensure steady and positive advancement. 
It felt apt to visualize this technology on a medium that is deeply rooted in every aspect of this new technology… Money. 

This is a unique 1/1 edition NFT, The first collector of this NFT will receive the illustrated note in an elegant border-less acrylic frame, (Shipping outside India can take up to 4-6 weeks)
